definitions.definition: A person who has physically removed him- or herself from the control or direction of a military or naval unit with the intention of permanently leaving

subdefinitions.definition: Under the United States Code of Military Justice , a person who has been placed on AWOL status for more than 30 days

main_definition: ( military ) A person who has physically removed him- or herself from the control or direction of a military or naval unit with the intention of permanently leaving
